resources.string:
January: Plain Pine Tree

Value: 1 point

This card is used in no combos.

January: Pine Tree & Tanzaku

Value: 5 points

This card is used in the Seven Tanzaku, Six Tanzaku, and Red Lettered Tanzaku combos.

January: Pine Tree & Crane

Value: 20 points

This card is used in the Five Bright, Four Bright, Three Bright, and Crane-Phoenix-Moon combos.

Value: 10 points

This card is used in the Three Bright combo.

 Value: 1 point

 Value: 10 points

November: Rain & Lightning

Value: 1 point

This card is used in the Straight Rain combo.

November: Rain & Tanzaku

Value: 5 points

This card is used in the Straight Rain combo.

November: Rain & Swallow

Value: 10 points

This card is used in the Straight Rain combo.

Value: 20 points

This card is used in the Five Bright and Straight Rain combos.

December: Plain Paulownia

Value: 1 point

This card is used in the Straight Paulownia combo.

December: Paulownia & Phoenix

Value: 20 points

This card is used in the Five Bright, Four Bright, Crane-Phoenix-Moon, and Straight Paulownia combos.
Five Bright: 100 points. Pine and Crane, Cherry and Curtain, Pampas Grass and Full Moon, Paulownia and Phoenix, and Rain and Poet.
Four Bright: 60 points. Pine and Crane, Cherry and Curtain, Pampas Grass and Full Moon, and Paulownia and Phoenix.
Three Bright: 30 points. Pine and Crane, Plum and Nightingale, and Cherry and Curtain.
Seven Tanzaku: 40 points. Any seven tanzaku, except for the Rain one.
Six Tanzaku: 30 points. Any six tanzaku, except for the Rain one.
Red Lettered Tanzaku: 40 points. The Pine, Plum, and Cherry tanzaku.
Blue Tanzaku: 40 points. The Peony, Chrysanthemum, and Maple tanzaku.
Grass Tanzaku: 20 points. The Wisteria, Iris, and Clover tanzaku.
The Views: 20 points for two of them, 40 points for all three. Pampas and Full Moon, Chrysanthemum and Wine Cup, Cherry and Curtain.
Crane-Phoenix-Moon: 20 points. Pine and Crane, Paulownia and Phoenix, and Pampas Grass and Full Moon.
Boar-Deer-Butterfly: 20 points. Bush Clover and Boar, Maple Leaves and Deer, and Peony and Butterfly.
Straight Wisteria: 10 points. All four Wisteria cards.
Straight Paulownia: 10 points. All four Paulownia cards.
Straight Rain: 10 points. All four Rain cards.
Straight Rain: Negates everyone\'s combo points, including yours. All four Rain cards.
Bush Clover and Wild Boar\n(10 points)
Pampas Grass and Full Moon\n(20 points)
